attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we pay a ridiculus amount of money for the BBC to make stupid programmes with and pay employees over the top wages. It is about time we scrap it or we have a choice if we want BBC on a TV or not,

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BBC-expansion/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
